SELECT mboardno, title, rdate, cnt, mname,r FROM ( SELECT mboardno, title, rdate, cnt, mname ,rownum as r FROM ( SELECT b.mboardno, b.title, b.rdate, b.cnt, m.mname FROM mboard b, member m where b.memberno = m.memberno ORDER BY mboardno DESC ) ) WHERE r >= #{start_num} AND r <= #{end_num}
SELECT b.mboardno, b.title, b.content, b.rdate, b.cnt, m.memberno FROM mboard b, member m where b.mboardno=#{mboardno} AND m.memberno=b.memberno
